reference.name: The Gift (Atiye)
reference.summary: The Gift (known in Turkey as Atiye) is a Turkish psychological thriller Netflix series starring Beren Saat. It was written by Jason George and Nuran Evren Şit. The first season consists of 8 episodes and became available for streaming on Netflix on December 27, 2019.[1][2] The series is an adaptation of the novel Dünyanın Uyanışı by Şengül Boybaş. The show tells the story of a painter in Istanbul embarks on a personal journey as she unearths universal secrets about an Anatolian archaeological site and its link to her past.

reference.name: La Cité de la peur
reference.summary: La Cité de la peur (French: "The City of Fear"), also known as Le film de Les Nuls ("The Les Nuls Movie"), is a 1994 French comedy film written by and starring Chantal Lauby, Alain Chabat and Dominique Farrugia. The movie parodies big budget American films (Basic Instinct, Pretty Woman and The Terminator, among others, are directly spoofed) and relies heavily on puns and word play, which makes it somewhat inaccessible for non-French speakers.

reference.name: OkCupid
reference.summary: OkCupid is an American-based, internationally operating online dating, friendship, and social networking website that features multiple-choice questions in order to match members. It is supported by advertisements, by paying users who do not see ads, and by selling user data for data mining.

author.name: mistermv
author.summary: Xiavier Dang, known as mistermv, is a french streamer, video content producer, presentator and music artist. He's specialized in video games and speedrun. He started music in the 1990s and his streaming career in the early 2010s.

reference.name: Clararunaway
reference.summary: Clararunaway is a french YouTube channel speaking about cinema and TV shows. From fun facts about Interstellar to how to deal with the death of an actor in a production, the channel cover different aspects of this art.
